title: 1 in custody after fatal Hallandale Beach shooting
content:
HALLANDALE BEACH, Fla. - A suspect is in custody after a fatal shooting in Hallandale Beach, police said.
Hallandale Beach police were called to a shooting about 6:15 p.m. in the 700 block of Northwest Seventh Avenue.
When officers arrived at the scene, they found three wounded victims, including one child, police said.
One of the wounded men was taken to an area hospital, where he later died, police said. Two victims were treated for non-life-threatening injures.
Police have taken one person in custody in connection to the shooting.
